thread.title: Coretelligent Reinforces Solid Leadership with Key Promotions, New Hire

author: cnbc.com
title: Coretelligent Reinforces Solid Leadership with Key Promotions, New Hire
text:
WESTWOOD, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Coretelligent, a premier provider of information technology support and private cloud service for small and mid-sized businesses, recently promoted Timothy Keshian to Chief Operating Officer and Christopher Messer to Chief Technical Officer. Guido Timmerman also joined the Coretelligent leadership team in a new role as Executive Vice President of Sales. These moves come as Coretelligent continues a strong growth trajectory after being named to Boston Business Journal's "Fast 50" list for 2018.
Timothy Keshian , Chief Operating Officer, brings strategic leadership and oversight to his teams, which include Field Engineers, Remote Support Engineers as well as the Corporate Strategy Team. His background includes 10 years of proactive planning and experience in IT services for organizations of all sizes. In his expanded role, Tim will be responsible for enabling seamless day-to-day operations for clients while helping them stay ahead of the technology curve. After his graduation from Bentley College, Mr. Keshian began his career with Coretelligent in customer-facing roles where he learned first-hand how to deliver on the uncompromising customer-centric philosophy for which Coretelligent is known.
Christopher Messer , Chief Technical Officer, is a strategic IT leader whose technical vision leads all aspects of Coretelligent's ongoing development. Chris joined Coretelligent in 2007 and has more than 15 years of experience in network, server, storage and infrastructure design as well as implementation. Since joining the company as a field engineer, Chris has advanced through Coretelligent to take advantage of this new leadership opportunity. He excels at working with organizations of all sizes to provide custom IT roadmaps for private, public and hybrid cloud deployments. Chris gains responsibility for key platforms at Coretelligent, including project engineering, Principal Solutions Architecture and security.
Guido Timmerman , Executive Vice President of Sales, joins Coretelligent by way of Europe where he built dozens of sales teams and enterprises from the ground up. His most recent experience includes running Global IT Infrastructure and Security services for a $500 million IT services firm. With Coretelligent, Guido's responsibilities will include managing the team of Business Development Managers as well as implementing a strategic business plan to expand the organization's core customer base.
These leadership changes, together with an enhanced strategic business plan, place Coretelligent in the ideal position to drive significant change for clients. Coretelligent has a long history of leadership in the IT services and security industry, winning multiple awards through the years for customer service and security excellence. Says Kevin Routhier, Founder and CEO of Coretelligent, "These well-deserved promotions and new appointment show our commitment to unflinching quality and superior execution from a team that you can trust. We look forward to supporting businesses of all sizes for many years to come."
About Coretelligent
Coretelligent is a leading provider of comprehensive managed IT and private cloud services, enabling organizations to seamlessly power and successfully grow their businesses. Founded in 2006 and led by world-class experts, Coretelligent’s key services – 360 Support , CoreCloud , CoreBDR , CoreArmor and managed IT – are relied on by top-tier organizations in the communications, education, financial services, life sciences, retail and technology industries among others. Coretelligent and its team are recognized as leaders by the Boston Business Journal, CRN, Inc., MSPmentor and the U.S. Chamber of Commerce. It is headquartered in Westwood, Mass., with offices in New York City, Philadelphia and the San Francisco Bay area. For more information, please visit www.coretelligent.com or follow us on Twitter , Facebook & LinkedIn .
